thread.title: Sukhwinder Singh and Kanika Kapoor to perform live in Canada
thread.title_full: Sukhwinder Singh and Kanika Kapoor to perform live in Canada - The Times of India

author: V Lakshmi
title: Sukhwinder Singh and Kanika Kapoor to perform live in Canada
text:
Bollywood's popular singer-duo Sukhwinder Singh and Kanika Kapoor are excited about conquering the globe with their hit tunes.
READ: ​Kanika Kapoor: People can't stop gushing over chikan!
Listen to songs of Sukhwinder Singh on Gaana.com
Yes, the two are part of the Music Magic Mast Mast Kalaiyaan 2015' ‪(‎M4K2015) concert that takes place in US and Canada.
Sukhwinder Singh, famous for his renditions such as AR Rahman's Oscar winning song Jai Ho! from film Slumdog Millionaire , and the 'Baby Doll' sensation Kanika Kapoor have already kick-started their journey with a concert in Washington DC on September 19. After performing in Orlando and Houston on September 25 and 26, they took Miami by storm the next day. During the last weekend, the duo was in Flushing (New York) and Elizabeth (New Jersey).
A source says, "On October 9, they will perform in Dallas, and on the next day, they will be in Toronto, Canada. The two are really happy about taking Bollywood music to the US and Canada, and are looking forward to hosting similar concerts across the globe."
